cause.description:
The Touching Tiny Lives Foundation is a non-profit 501(c)3 organization committed to ensuring the dignity of children impacted by the HIV/AIDS pandemic in Lesotho, Africa. Through the provision of clinical care and subsistence support, the implementations of HIV transmission prevention programs, and the promotion of global social responsibility, we strive to catalyze processes of healing and hope for the children and communities of Lesotho.
1. Help fight HIV and AIDs
2. Help the children of Lesotho
3. Promotion of global social responsibility
cause.mission: The Touching Tiny Lives Foundation's mission is to ensure the dignity of children impacted by the HIV/AIDS pandemic in Lesotho, Africa.
cause.name: Touching Tiny Lives
